description: This is a clock widget of "Pesoguin", a popular character in Japan. Pesoguin on the home screen tells you time in 12-hour format or 24-hour format. A tap tickles him and double taps change his expressions. On the hour every hour he acts in a certain way. In the full version 2 options for the Pesoguin Clock Widget are available. Please tap on the widget, and “Pesoguin” will speak to you. In this easy game you can enjoy the life with dear Pesoguin. You’ll find it a tool with full of entertainment. This application is a widget for your home screen and you can enjoy personalization of it. Keep pressing the home screen till an additional menu of widgets appears. Pick out “Pesoguine Clock” from a list of widgets. ※ Pesoguin is an imaginary animal similar to an emperor penguin's baby, which is very cute and lives on the Internet, PCs, and mobile phones. He will relax your mind. He has a cute girlfriend, "Pesoko". They appear in a Japanese four-frame comics strip book.
release_text: Revised / Introduces a new look Pesoguin.

description: An electric locomotive is a locomotive powered by electricity from overhead lines, a third rail or an on-board energy storage device (such as a chemical battery or fuel cell). Electrically propelled locomotives with on-board fuelled prime movers, such as diesel engines or gas turbines, are classed as diesel-electric or gas turbine-electric locomotives because the electric generator/motor combination only serves as a power transmission system. Electricity is used to eliminate smoke and take advantage of the high efficiency of electric motors; however, the cost of railway electrification means that usually only heavily used lines can be electrified.

This is the FREE LITE version, while the FULL version includes a lot of features and options. A Fall edition of the Teddy Bear Live Wallpaper. As usual it contains high-quality detailed live backgrounds and a lot of items to dress Teddy in. Visit us on Facebook - http://facebook.com/leensworkshop Follow us on Twitter - http://twitter.com/LeensWorkshop IMPORTANT NOTE: If you're experiencing any issue with the wallpaper don't hesitate to contact us by email - leen.developer@gmail.com . In 99% of cases we cannot resolve an issue reported as a comment. Full version features: ----------------------------- - Gyro 3D (3D parallax) effect. (REQUIRES GYROSCOPE); - Halloween theme (a background and a set of items); - Day and night mode. You can turn on day time or night time or enable the auto mode, which will change day to night and night to day at the time you chose; - Three amazing live backgrounds; - A lot of items and accessories to combine (including clothes, glasses, caps, pendants, and even wings!); - Interactive Bear you can play with. Device features: ---------------------- - Full support for portrait and landscape orientations; - Efficient battery consumption. The wallpaper is rendered only when it is really visible; - An ability to limit the number of frames per second to prolong battery life. - Can be moved to the SD card; - Requires OpenGL ES 2.0. How to interact (available only in the FULL Version): -------------------------------------------------------------------------- - You can tickle Bear's paws, belly, and head and he will react in various ways (see video for details); - At night time, when Bear sleeps, you can wake him up by ticking him or by moving the screen.

WiFiLine is an Android application for indoor positioning based on circumstantial WiFi signals. WiFiLine allows you to locate yourself in buildings populated with WiFi hotspots, which is the case for most of bussiness centers and shopping malls. For every such place, WiFiLine uses a special map consisting of the place's floor plan and a set of WiFi signal measurements. WiFi hotspots, whose signals are used for position detection, do not have to be public hotspots. All what is important for WiFiLine is WiFi signals of existing hotspots measured at various points. Existing maps are hosted on WiFiLine site and can be downloaded just within WiFiLine. If you can't find a map for a place which you are interested in, you can build such a map yourself during a visit to the place. Visit WiFiLine homesite: http://weborienteer.com Find latest news in the blog: http://wifiline.blogspot.com IMPORTANT: WiFi should be enabled in the system Settings -> Location -> Mode.
release_text: Tablet support is explicitly specified in the manifest.

description: Grow is not your typical fish game where you wait for your pet fish to grow and mindlessly tap on the screen to feed it. We’re not catching fishes today so go ahead and throw away your fishing equipments. Be ready to be hungry, very hungry, even hungrier than a shark because, in Grow, your job is to eat everything in the aquarium! Reviews: "4.5/5 Grow is massively addictive." androidtapp.com "5/5 What an awesome game." androidgamesreview.com "Extremely addictive." androidrundown.com "Grow is a fun, casual time-killer that anyone can enjoy." android-apps.com "[Grow] is a unique and enjoyable ride that’s worth returning to once its done." androidspin.com You are a little fish with a big appetite and dreams. So you eat. And eat. Till eventually, you Grow. From a cramped jar to the open sea, play the adventure mode to explore different habitats. Collect coins to upgrade power-ups in the shop, then test your skills in survival mode, where endless hours of replay and online leader board awaits. Features: * 78 levels with 7 stunning environments * Two difficulty modes, Normal and Advanced, with their own star rankings * 7 endless survival levels with global leader board * Three control options: tilt, virtual joystick, and touch-and-move * Supports Left/Right handed control options * Five unique power-ups with 17 upgrades to unlock * Six types of enemies with unique behaviors If you have questions or need support, please email, support[at]epicpixel.com

Die kostenlose Fahrplan-App „VAG mobil“ der Freiburger Verkehrs AG ist der hilfreiche Begleiter im öffentlichen Personennahverkehr (ÖPNV) für das komplette Verbundgebiet (Freiburg und die Landkreise Breisgau-Hochschwarzwald sowie Emmendingen) und Baden-Württemberg. Die mobile Fahrplanauskunft zeigt dem Nutzer überall und jederzeit die besten Verbindungen und Alternativrouten mit Bus und Bahn an. Für Verbindungen innerhalb des Regio-Verkehrsverbund Freiburg (RVF) können bestimmte Tickets (z.B. Einzelfahrscheine, Tageskarten) für eine gewählte Verbindung oder direkt gekauft werden. Hierzu ist eine einmalige Anmeldung über die App notwendig. Darüber hinaus sind Informationen zu den RVF-Tarifen und verschiedene Liniennetzpläne verfügbar. Die Verbindungen lassen sich per SMS oder E-Mail versenden, sowie im Kalender eintragen. The free app timetable "VAG mobile" Freiburger of traffic AG is the useful pets in public transport (PT) for the entire network area (Freiburg and the Breisgau-Hochschwarzwald and Emmendingen) and Baden-Württemberg. The mobile timetable information shows users anywhere, anytime at the best connections and alternative routes by bus and train. For compounds within the Regional Transport Association Freiburg (RVF) certain tickets (eg single tickets, day tickets) are purchased directly for a dialed call, or. For this purpose, a single sign-on, the app is necessary. In addition, information on the RVF rates and various line networks are available. The compounds can be sent by SMS or email, and add the calendar.

Englisch für Kinder - Vokabeltrainer, Englisch Vokabeltrainer für kleine Kinder Lernen Sie über 500 englischen gewaltlose Vokabeln. Der Unterricht ist auch für kleine Kinder geeignet. Die Kinder brauchen im Grunde kein Lesen, denn die ganze Bedienung gibt es nur über Bilder, die ein bestimmtes Wort darstellen. Jedes Wort wurde durch einen Muttersprachler in Deutsch und Englisch aufgenommen und während des Unterrichts sieht man den englischen Text. Dieses Englisch ist auf Reisen sehr praktisch, denn es enthält auch Kategorien wie Flugzeug, Stadt, Geschäfte, Nahrungsmittel, Krankenhaus, Meer und andere… Die ersten sechs Lektionen gibt es ganz kostenlos. Weitere Lektionen gibt es für die geringe Gebühr von 1,0 EUR. http://www.pmq-software.com/sw/de/lernspiele/ Programmbeschreibung: Zuerst wählen Sie Vokabelkategorie und dann eine von drei weiteren Möglichkeiten: 1. Erkennt Man sieht sechs Bilder und es wird ein gesuchtes Wort englisch ausgesprochen. Falls Sie das richtige Bild für ein vorgegebenes Wort wählen, setzen Sie in der Unterricht fort. Falls Sie das Wort nicht erraten, dann wird dieses Wort nochmals in die Unterricht eingefügt. Falls Sie nicht wissen, gibt es hier die Hilfemöglichkeit über die Fragezeichentaste. 2. Ansieh Hier sieht man alle Karten und man kann zwischen ihnen auswählen. Unter jeder Karte gibt es einen deutschen und einen englischen Text und über die Fähnchentaste kann man das Textlesen auslösen. 3. Pexeso Als Bonus wird das Erholungsspiel Pexeso geboten. Hier gibt es immer 10 zufällig gewählte Kartenpaare aus der gewälten Lektion. Die gedrehten Karten sind auf der Fläche verteilt und man dreht sie zu zweit. Das Spielziel ist, alle Paare mit möglichst wenigen Versuchen zu finden. Keywords: Englische Vokabeln, English English for Kids - Vocabulary, English Vocabulary Builder for small children Learn over 500 English-violent vocabulary. The lessons are also suitable for small children. The children need basically no reading, because the whole operation, there are only about images that represent a particular word. Every word was recorded by a native speaker in German and English during classes you can see the English text. This English is traveling very convenient, because it also includes categories such as aircraft, town, shops, food, hospital, and other sea ... The first six lessons there is absolutely free. More lessons are available for the small fee of 1.0 EUR. http://www.pmq-software.com/sw/de/lernspiele/ Program description: First select vocabulary category and then one of three other options: . 1 Detects We see six images and an target word spoken English. If you choose the right picture for a given word, continue in the classroom. If you do not guess the word, then that word is also incorporated into the lessons. If you do not know, there is the opportunity to help on the question mark button. . 2 Ansieh Here you can see all the cards and you can choose between them. Under each card there is a German and an English text and the flag button, you can invoke the text reading. . 3 Pexeso As a bonus, the rest playing Pairs is offered. There are always 10 randomly selected pairs of cards from the gewälten lesson. The rotated cards are distributed on the surface and turning them in pairs. The aim of the game is to find all pairs with as few attempts. Keywords: English vocabulary, English

description: Search an online database that contains over 347 000 words. Supports American, British and Canadian English. Search for words with missing letters. Search for anagrams. Useful for both crosswords and scrabble. Look up definitions on Google. Add missing words to the database. Newly added words are verified, and once verified, will become available to all app users. For obvious reasons, only words that don't contain missing letters, can be added to the database.
release_text: 1.0.19 A few people have reported a java.lang.IllegalStateException. I've been unable to reproduce the exception, but I've made code changes which I hope will "elegantly" handle the exception and stop the app from crashing.

description: Electric Scren was designed generaly for entertainment. You can use it as a prank, as a nasty irritative instrument or it can just keep your kids away from your phones or tablets. Find your own way to use it, be creative, share it. Main features: - vibration - electric buzz - selectable lightning color - randomized lightning color - transparent overlay - multi touch Have Fun !

iBaloot for Android iBaloot is a turn-based single or multi-players card game popular in Arab world. Currently, the game supports three platforms, including Android. There is a logic and fun associated with the iBaloot.  In the game, 4 players divide into 2 teams, two players in each and the rest of the game is played based on Baloot’s rules which are almost common everywhere. iBaloot Application simulates the real cards game to be more user friendly and entertaining mobile version of the game. iBaloot provides a solutions for playing anytime and anywhere with anybody. In fact, ibaloot is becoming part of our society as you can see student, teachers, engineers, managers, doctors and almost everyone are enjoying playing baloot. iBaloot connects the new generation with the old, makes friends and creates a level of excitement and enjoyment about playing Baloot. iBaloot allows users to design his room, cards, avatar and his local accent. No matter where you are, now you can enjoy playing offline or online, ask your friends to play, send or receive gifts, collect points and ranks yourself in the top players’ list. To make it a way attractive and communicable, we’ve added a new voice command feature. Using this feature, users will be talk to their teammates with voice commands. We try to make this game as sociable as possible, where the players can add new friends and make their own friend list. To make the game more interactive and fun, we’ve added a new feature to enable players send and receive the gifts from other players during the game.

The Official Street League Skateboarding Mobile Game. Loved by skaters all over the world. Better then fingerboarding. Note: True Skate comes with a single skate park and contains additional content only available by In-App purchase. See below. Features: - Realistic touch based physics. - Deck wear. Scuff up your Deck. - Flick the board to make it react exactly how you would expect. - Drag your finger on the ground to push. - A beautiful skate park to get lost in including ledges, stairs, grind rails plus a bowl, half pipe and quarter pipes. (Additional skate parks are now available as an In-App Purchase) - Slow motion. - User challenges - Replay viewer - Global leaderboards. Available by IN-APP PURCHASE only: - Additional skateparks and locations. - Street League Skateboarding courses. Optional IN-APP PURCHASES: (The same content is also available for free by spending True Credits earned by doing tricks and finishing missions) - Unlock all missions. - Unlimited slow motion. - Unlimited board image changes. - Unlimited wheel color changes. - Unlock lists

This is our 55 min Multimedia tour of the Vatican Basilica Roma featuring 12 audio tracks and over 70 images describing the art and history of the Basilica. Perfect way to visit the new tomb of John Paul 2(jp2), spend as much time as you like with out being rushed with a tour group.If you like Rick steves and trip advisor, and the tripadvisor app, give us a try. We specialize in giving more specific detail, with timelines, more in-depth material and academic level research, and give you the gems acquired from years living, working and studying in Rome by ex-pats. Application preview available with Romavita Map and Restaurant Guide. Also available is a 12 audio tour of the Sistine Chapel. If you like Rick steves and trip advisors apps give us a try. we specialize in giving more specific detail, with timelines, more in-depth material and academic level research, we go beyond the general and basic fluff and the opinions of other tourist and give you the gems acquired from years living, working and studying in Rome by ex-pats. Audio tracks by native English speaker and active tour guide of the Vatican. Includes time-line and pictures of major figures so that people and dates can be more clearly contextualized. Replace the archaic tour book, Experience Roma mobile style. Features: - Over 55 minutes of content rich audio presentation, includes hi-res photo's and diagrams. - All major points of interest, including the Pieta, the Baldacchino, Dome, grave, chair and more. - Once loaded no need for access to WiFi or Internet. - Written by experienced tour-guides - Spoken by native English speaker - Includes time-line from 2000 BC - 2003 AD Now you can take in the art with the enhancement of detail photos diagrams, and audio that uses dramatize music to enrich and deepen the impact of the experience while you go at your pace. Designed to be used as stand alone tour. Its great, however for listening to before a visit; if you have to wait in an airport, on the train, night before or morning of your tour. Great also after as a souvenir, show and tell your friends your favorite art, or use it to retain what you learned and relive your experience. Whatever reason you choose our team has carefully chosen beautiful pictures and an easily to use time line to enhance what you take and retain from the tour. Audio and images are stored on SD card providing a small application size. Application can be moved to SD card after loading. Its highly recommended to have access to WiFi during media download. Once downloaded no need for access to the internet while touring the Vatican. Application provides pinch zoom / pan of the Vatican floor plan to allow for self-guided tour of the Basilica. There is over 55 minutes of audio contained in the 12 tracks each track has a number of images associated with the audio.
release_text: Allowed application storage to SD card. Code clean up and bug fixes, now allow users to recover missing content. Version 3.8 media included with initial application. Added check that media content was downloaded correctly. HTC (Anish) issue if media file got corrupted.

Configurable moving checklist or planner with everything needed to plan your house moving. Save all the time typing the home moving list as it comes pre-populated with more than 210 items. Add box contents as you pack them for the final move. Easy and very intuitive thumb friendly check/uncheck options. With ability to create multiple lists - you can easily create lists for packing boxes, moving essentials etc. Customize it to your preference. UNLIMITED lists are supported. PLEASE NOTE: All the features listed in the description are INCLUDED with the purchase. The in-app purchase option is used only if you want to purchase additional templates (in addition to moving list). The app does NOT need internet connection. Your privacy is guaranteed. We back our app with 100% refund ANYTIME beyond the refund window. If you are not satisfied for any reason, just send us an email. New Features! - Tablet support. Quick navigation - just swipe right to reveal the left pane. "Quick add" features. You can add notes, quantity and an additional measurement. Auto sort ability. Checkout more features below. Features include: - Tablet support. - Quick navigation. For small screen devices, just swipe right to reveal the left pane. - Create new lists from factory templates in minutes. - Add/Edit or delete lists/items/categories. - Quickly add item or category from the same screen with the "Quick Add" feature. - Add Notes, Quantity and an additional measurement (weight/volume/temperature etc) for each item. - Hide/Unhide checked items, move checked to bottom/top. - Ability to delete all checked items. - "Add After This" or "Add Before This" option to insert items wherever you want and quickly. - Password protect from prying eyes. - Option to check all/uncheck all so you can reuse the list again. - Copy or Move between lists, categories and items. Quickly creates your own personal list in matter of minutes. - Auto Sort either in ascending or descending order. - Rearrange items/categories/lists using drag/drop. - Indicates the total number of items and the number of items that need to be completed. - Color coded (green, yellow and red) for a visually appealing presentation - Export/Backup all lists to external storage and import them back when needed. - Edit your list on your computer and import it back. - Easily email with your friends / family using any sharing client you have on your device. - Send and share via Bluetooth to any bluetooth enabled device - Easily send to your printer (via email - Needs email to print support on your printer)
release_text: - Option to purchase more templates. - Tablet support. Swipe right to reveal left pane. - Action Bar for all menu options. - Auto Sort options. - Drag/Drop for rearranging. - Quick Add feature. - Add Notes, Quantity and addt'l measurement for each item. - Multiple Checked item options - Move items to bottom/top, show all, hide checked - Delete All checked items.

This is a simple notebook, but with an easy to use backup and restore functionality. This notebook app is almost as easy to use as notepad and great for taking quick notes. Backup and restore is useful to keep important data safe, and if you get a new phone or pad, it is easy to restore the backup to another device. This also enables you to use the same notebook data across more devices. Under a page, you can edit, delete page and revert changes. If you don't revert, changes are automatically saved. The application uses Google account and internet for backup and restore. You can see your backup online here: https://mdroidnotebook.appspot.com/

Have fun with your friends by playing multiplayer games and doing fun challenges. Challenge Your Friends requires two players and one device. This is not online multiplayer game, but both players play on the same device. Play games for two. HOW IT WORKS: Step 1: Find a friend. Step 2: Choose one of the multiplayer games. Step 3: The game gives you random challenge. Step 4: If you both accept the challenge - press ACCEPT. Step 5: PLAY. Step 6: When the game is over, do the challenge. Follow Challenge Your Friends on Facebook for news and updates: https://www.facebook.com/challengeyourfriendsgame Challenge Your Friends is multiplayer (two player actually) game and it is played on one device/phone/tablet. There aren't many multiplayer (two player) games like this on the Play Store. Enjoy while playing Challenge Your Friends!
release_text: New game added: "Racing", redesigned menus, reduced APK size, fixed bugs...

description: Racing whenever you like, wherever you like! Asphalt Racing is the genre of arcade racing. Drive your car through highway traffic, and try to be the faster driver! This is a native Android Highway Car Avoidance Game. The aim is to tilt the device to steer away from the incoming vehicles. The game also includes checkpoints which the player can catch for extra points and a handy boost function for those players that are hard to trill.

Die App ermöglicht Ihnen den Zugriff auf Ihre Konten bei der 1822direkt sowie zusätzlich auf die meisten Konten anderer deutscher Banken und Sparkassen. Beachten Sie bitte, dass ein Konto bei der 1822direkt für die Nutzung der App erforderlich ist. Mit der Banking-App der 1822direkt haben Sie Ihre Finanzen jederzeit im Überblick – wo immer und wann immer Sie wollen. Einfach, komfortabel, intelligent und vor allem sicher. FUNKTIONEN - Multibankenfähigkeit - Kontostand prüfen (Einzel- und Gesamtsaldo) - Umsätze anzeigen (auch vorgemerkte Umsätze) - Bilder an Umsätze hängen (bis zu sechs Bilder pro Umsatz, z.B. für Garantiefälle) - Einzel- und Terminüberweisungen durchführen - inkl. SEPA - Daueraufträge verwalten - inkl. SEPA - Geldautomatenfinder - Alle Konten durchsuchen - Vorlagen verwalten - Auswertungen erstellen (Grafik oder Liste) - Sprachwahl: Deutsch, Englisch, Türkisch (je nach Systemeinstellung Ihres Geräts) UNTERSTÜTZTE SICHERHEITSVERFAHREN - Für Konten der 1822direkt: iTAN - Weitere Verfahren sind bei Fremdinstituten möglich. Bitte erfragen Sie diese direkt bei dem Kreditinstitut. MULTIBANKENFÄHIG Sie können mit der 1822direkt-Banking App beliebig viele Konten bei zahlreichen deutschen Kreditinstituten einrichten, sofern Sie über mindestens ein Konto bei der 1822direkt verfügen. Ihr 1822direkt-Konto muss in der App zur Initialisierung als erstes eingerichtet werden. Danach sind beliebig viele Konten auch von Fremdbanken aktivierbar. Achtung: Die Unterstützung hängt vom jeweiligen Institut ab. Voraussetzung: Ihr Konto muss für das Online-Banking mittels HBCI mit PIN/TAN bzw. FinTS mit PIN/TAN freigeschaltet sein. Nicht unterstützt werden Commerzbank, TARGOBANK, BMW Bank, Volkswagen Bank, Santander Bank, Bank of Scotland und andere. UNTERSTÜTZTE KONTOARTEN (je nach Institut) - Girokonten - Festgeldkonten - Tagesgeldkonten - Depots - Sparkonten - LBS-Bausparkonten - Darlehenskonten - Kreditkartenumsätze bei Sparkassen (keine DKB-Kreditkarte) SICHERHEIT AUF HÖCHSTEM NIVEAU Ihr Geld und Ihre persönlichen Daten sind mit der 1822direkt-Banking App maximal geschützt – entsprechend der Vorgaben der deutschen Kreditinstitute zum Online-Banking. - Kommunikation über geprüfte Schnittstellen - Hohe Verschlüsselung - Schutz durch ein von Ihnen angelegtes individuelles Passwort - Autolock-Funktion zur Sperrung der App - Verschlüsselung der gespeicherten Daten Ihre Finanzen und Daten sind so auch bei Verlust des Gerätes vor dem Zugriff Fremder geschützt. SO EINFACH GEHT'S 1. Laden Sie die App herunter 2. Legen Sie ein Passwort für den App-Zugang fest 3. Richten Sie Ihre Bankkonten ein - mit denselben Zugangsdaten wie beim 1822direkt-Online-Banking bzw. wie auf der Webseite Ihrer Bank oder Sparkasse SUPPORT - Brauchen Sie Hilfe bei der Einrichtung Ihrer Bankverbindungen oder Nutzung der App? Schauen Sie einfach in den FAQs oder in der Hilfe-Funktion direkt in der App nach oder senden Sie eine E-Mail an support@1822direkt.de . - Sollten Sie Ergänzungen oder Fehlerhinweise zu unserer App haben, können Sie uns gerne eine Mitteilung direkt aus der App zuschicken (optional inkl. Sendeprotokoll). - Bitte beachten Sie, dass für die Nutzung der Geldautomatensuche die Google-Play-Dienste installiert sein müssen The app allows you to access your accounts at 1822direkt and in addition to most accounts of other German banks and savings banks. Note that an account with the 1822direkt is required for our use of the app. With the banking app 1822direkt you have your finances at any time at a glance - wherever and whenever you want. Simple, convenient, intelligent and above all safe. FUNCTIONS - Multi-bank capability - Check account balance (individual and overall balance) - View transactions (also earmarked revenues) - Images of revenues depend (up to six images per turnover, eg for warranty) - Single and date remittances to perform - including SEPA. - Manage standing orders - including SEPA. - ATM Finder - Browse all accounts - Manage Templates - Create Indexes (graphic or list) - Language: German, English, Turkish (depending on system settings of your device) SUPPORTED SAFETY PROCEDURES - For accounts 1822direkt: iTAN - Other methods are possible with foreign institutions. Please contact them directly at the bank. MULTI BANK OPERATIONAL You can set up with the 1822direkt banking app as many accounts at several German banks, provided you have at least one account at 1822direkt. 1822direkt your account must be set up in the app to initialize first. Then are many accounts of foreign banks also activated. Note: The support depends on the institution. Prerequisite: Your account must be activated for online banking using HBCI PIN / TAN or FinTS with PIN / TAN. Are not supported Commerzbank, Citibank, BMW Bank, Volkswagen Bank, Santander Bank, Bank of Scotland and others. ACCOUNT TYPES SUPPORTED (depending on the institution) - Current accounts - Time deposits - Money market accounts - Depots - Savings accounts - LBS building society accounts - Loan accounts - Credit card transactions at savings banks (DKB-no credit card) SAFETY AT THE HIGHEST LEVEL Your money and your personal information remains protected with 1822direkt banking app - in accordance with the requirements of the German banks for online banking. - Communication via certified interfaces - High Encryption - Protection by an applied you individual password - Autolock function for disabling the app - Encryption of stored data Your finances and data are protected in case of loss of the device before accessing stranger. SO IT'S EASY 1 Download the app 2 Specify a password for the app access 3 Set up your bank accounts - with the same credentials as the 1822direkt online banking or as the website of your bank or building society SUPPORT - Need help in setting up your bank account or use the app? Just look at the FAQ or Help function directly in the app now or send an e-mail to support@1822direkt.de . - If you have additions or error information to our app, please send us a message directly from the app send (optionally including transmission protocol.). - Please note that the use of ATMs Search Google Play services must be installed

The best point it is easy to use. It owns all necessary funtions which related alarm. Confident that this is th most powerful alarm system in the world!

Welcome to Block Invasion, full of zombies and enemies who all want to… eat you. You must survive! Think strategically and don't put your gun down, not even for a moment! As you progress, The number of enemies constantly increases to the point you will be frantically fighting for survival amongst hordes of zombies. The walking dead will swarm you, and it is your choice to either run or fight back. Do not let your guard down or you will surely be eaten. In this game with fantastic car physics you will be able to: • Be a driver in bank robbery • Run away from police • Avoid road blocks and barricades • Find a way out of town • Jump on buildings and over river • Catch criminals • Collect and deliver boxes • Repair antenna towers • Drive over trash cans • Search for things • Drive passengers by bus • Perform precise parking • Drive bus on a test polygon • Fuel the vehicle on gas station • Deliver patients to hospital • Race with time This game is available in 2 versions: • Lite (free, total download size 49 MB, 10 levels) • Full (paid, no ads, total download size 49 MB, 30 levels) You will experience following driving modes: • High speed drive • Police pursuit • Driving cars with front and back drive • Driving cars with 4 wheel drive, with and without ESP • Parking cars • Precise driving and parking of buses • Off-road driving • Driving through tunnels and over wooden bridges Advantages: • Beautiful open door scenarios • 30 eye-popping, visually attractive tracks in full version (10 in lite/free version) • Complete game size is only 46 MB (29 for lite version) - no extra download needed • Simple but colorful and fast graphics rendering • Great sound Game includes following missions: • Mafia driver - 9 levels (5 in lite version) • Pickup driver - 6 levels (2 in lite version) • Bus driver - 9 levels (3 in lite version) • Police driver - 3 levels (1 in lite version) • Ambulance driver - 3 levels (1 in lite version) Features: • Unity 3D engine • NVIDIA® PhysX® physics engine • Support for both OpenGL 1.x and OpenGL 2.0 • Available for Android 2.0.1 Eclair (API level 6) or higher • Possibility to configure difficulty level: easy, medium, hard • Possibility to configure way to control your vehicle: by touch, by slidem by using wheel and by tilt screen • Possibility to reduce visibility range, to increase frame rate on low-end devices • Possibility to change camera during game (in car, follow car, rotate cam, dynamic and static) • Works even on low-end devices such as Huawei Media pad (but with reduced visibility range) • Supports all screen sizes from e.g. Samsung Galaxy Mini (480x320) to Samsung Galaxy S3 or Huawei Tablets Notes: • This is a LITE version. It has 10 levels. If you want to play full game with 30 levels, search for Duty Driver FULL at Google Play. • Screenshots are both from lite and full version of Duty Driver and lite version doesn't include all scenes visible in screenshots • On some devices visibility range, model details and textures might different, depending of device that you are using • Use this LITE version to check Duty Driver performance, before downloading full version • In case of bad performance, reduce visibility range in OPTIONS/GRAPHICS to medium or low • If you will like this game, check occasionally Google Play for new versions of Duty Driver • Email us your experience with this game: ideas for new episodes of Duty Driver, what you don't like and what kind of missions did you like the best • Enjoy the game!

description: ■概要 　本アプリは、全国の天気予報を簡単に確認できるものです。よく確認する場所については、予めステータスバーへ登録しておくことも可能です。 また、Twitter連動により今いる場所のお天気を簡単につぶやくことができ、各地の今の天気をTwitter上で共有できます。 ■注意事項 　１）ステータスバーへ登録できる場所は１箇所のみです。 　２）今の天気をつぶやくには、Twitterアカウントが必要です。 　３）つぶやく際におおまかな場所が自動設定されます。細かすぎる場合は適宜修正をお願いします。 　４）Twitterのハッシュタグは「#social_weather_news」です。 ■キーワード 　今日、明日の天気予報、ステータスバー登録、ソーシャル、Twitter

Real Life Connected Taptalk is the fastest way to exchange photo and video messages with your family and friends. Just tap someone's face to send them a photo, or tap and hold their face to send a video. Every photo or video you receive is created just for you. So you know it's personal. No filters. No retakes. Share your real life with the people you love, and who love you. In the moment. Exactly the way you are. "When I moved away, I really missed all my friends from San Diego. But now we send taps to each other all day. It's like the crew is still together." -Michael S. "I woke up to 40 taps from my family. It was amazing." -Jimmy J. "The only app my 90 year old grandfather knows how to use on his iPad is Taptalk. He lives 435 miles away, but now we see each other every day." -Jade C. "Taptalk is so much better than sms or phone calls for wrangling all the kids and keeping coordinated while running around to all our activities." -Becca N. "I got the wolfpack in my pocket." -Arjun A. Features: - Tap to send a photo - Hold to send a video - See a satellite map for each tap - Or, turn off your location for more privacy - Express yourself by adding text or emoji So easy your mom can use it. Mine does! =)

LOOK NO FURTHER. This is the perfect app to help you on your physics homework. Perfect for students of Physics at any level. No more late nights, no more trying to figure out what the teacher meant. As a recent student of a Physics class, I've designed an app that I think would be most beneficial to students of Physics. In this full version there are over 65 different equations and references for almost all constants in Physics. This full version includes equations and variables from: -Atomic and Nuclear Physics -Electricity and Magnetism -Fluid Mechanics and Thermal Physics -Newtonian Mechanics -Waves and Optics This app includes an "Equation" section to browse through different types of equations. Just enter in numbers into the correct text box and leave one text box blank for the app to solve. It also includes an "Equation Finder" section. If you do not know what formula to use, enter in your givens and find the equation that is right for you!

Akbank Direkt Tablet uygulaması, bankacılık işlemlerinizi istediğiniz yerden, istediğiniz zaman gerçekleştirebilmeniz için özel tasarımı ve sunduğu farklı kullanıcı deneyimiyle şimdi Google Play Store’da!   Akbank Direkt Tablet uygulaması, kişiselleştirilmiş ana sayfası ile özel bir mobil bankacılık deneyimi sunuyor. Ayrıca tek şifreyle giriş kolaylığı ve Türkiye’de ilk kez kredi kartı bilgileriyle giriş imkânı sağlıyor.   Akbank Direkt Tablet uygulamasıyla, ihtiyaç duyduğunuz her an, para transferinden gün içi işlem görüntülemeye, kredi işlemlerinden kart borcu ödemeye kadar birçok bankacılık işleminizi kolayca gerçekleştirebilirsiniz. Müşteri numaranızla ilk kez giriş yaparken, müşteri numaranızı, kullanıcı adınızı ve Akbank Direkt şifrenizi; kredi kartınızla ilk kez giriş yaparken, kredi kartı numaranızı, kartınızın son kullanma tarihini ve kart şifrenizi girin. Daha sonraki tüm girişlerinizde, ilk kez müşteri numaranızla girdiyseniz, yalnızca Akbank Direkt şifrenizle; kredi kartı numaranızla girdiyseniz, yalnızca kredi kartı şifrenizle giriş yapabilirsiniz. Ayrıca, uygulama içinde yer alan En Yakın Akbank ve döviz hesaplama modüllerinden Akbank müşterisi olmasanız bile faydalanabilirsiniz.   Her türlü soru ve sorununuz için Twitter sayfamızı ziyaret edebilirsiniz: www.twitter.com/akbank ---- Bank wherever and whenever you like with the specially designed and exceptionally user-friendly Akbank Direkt Tablet app now available on the Google Play Store!   Akbank Direkt Tablet app offers you a unique banking experience with its personalized main page accessed conveniently with a single password. It is also the first app in Turkey that allows you to log in with your credit card information.   Transfer funds, review the day’s transactions, apply for loans, pay bills... All that and more are at your fingertips with Akbank Direkt Tablet. If you enter your client number, user name and Akbank Direct password the first time you use the app, you can log in with just your Akbank Direct password at subsequent uses. Or, you can enter your credit card number, card expiry date and card password at initial access to continue logging in later with no more than your credit card password. Additionally, you can take advantage of the app’s Nearest Akbank and foreign currency calculator features even if you are not an Akbank client.   If you have any questions or need trouble-shooting, be sure to contact us on our Twitter page at www.twitter.com/akbank
release_text: Bu güncelleme ile; Bankacılık Düzenleme ve Denetleme Kurumu’ndan tüm bankalara iletilen yasal düzenleme gereği Kredi Kartı ile Giriş seçeneğinde düzenleme yapılmıştır. Artık Akbank Direkt’e ilgili sekmeden kredi kartı şifreniz yerine Akbank Direkt şifrenizle girebilirsiniz. Akbank Direkt şifrenizi bilmiyorsanız, uygulama içerisinde bulunan “Şifremi Unuttum” sekmesinden alabilirsiniz..

Spider Solitaire Remove all the cards from the table in the fewest number of moves. Spider Solitaire is played with two decks of cards. Depending on the difficulty level, the decks consist of either one, two, or four different suits. The cards are arranged in ten columns. The top card in each column is face up, the rest are face down. The remaining cards are piled in the lower-right corner of the table. To win, you must remove all the cards from the table by building columns organized in descending order, from king to ace. At intermediate and advanced levels, the cards must also match suit. When you succeed in building a sequentially-ordered column, it flies off the table. If you run out of moves, click the pile at the bottom of the table and Windows deals a new row of cards. You aren't limited to moving just one card at a time. If a run of cards are all in the same suit, and arranged in numeric order, you can drag them around as if they were a single card.

description: IMPORTANT: The latest release contains multiple options for installing the watch apps (App Store or Direct). If one does not work, please try the other as the latest official Pebble app is a bit buggy. You can also find and install all the watch apps by searching "Pebble Rocker" in the Pebble app store. If you still have troubles please email support at support@smallrocksoftware.com Pebble Rocker is an ever-growing collection of Pebble Watch apps that work in conjunction with your Android device to enhance your Pebble smart watch. Included Watch Apps - Android Settings: View & change Android settings from your watch.   - Battery Level: view Android battery level and receive low battery notification (optional).   - Ringtone: view/change state (silent/vibrate/normal) and volume.   - Media Volume: view/change media volume.   - Wifi: enable/disable wifi.   - Bluetooth: enable/disable bluetooth. - Chopper (Game): See how long you can navigate the Chopper through the perilous caverns. - Camera Control: Use your Pebble watch to take photos with your phone.   - Use your Pebble watch to take photos with your phone.   - Take an instant photo or use a timer from 5-30 seconds.   - Turn flash on/off/auto from your Pebble.   - Switch between rear/front camera from your Pebble.   - Turn camera sounds on/off from your Pebble.   - Automatically preview taken photo on your watch. - Facebook: browse your Facebook feed on your Pebble watch.   - View feed entry picture (the picture associated with a status update / wall post).   - View feed entry comments. - Foursquare: find nearby venues and check in from your Pebble watch.   - Check in directly from your watch.   - Check in options: private, public, Facebook, & Twitter. - Twitter: browse your home timeline on your pebble watch. - Events: find activities in your area such as music, community events, conferences and more. - Photos: browse your Android photo gallery on your Pebble watch.   - Configure how your photos are converted for viewing using five adjustable filters.   - Configure which folders are searched for photos. - Tip Calculator: quickly calculate 10, 15 and 20% tips (including totals) when dining out. - Phone Pager: use your Pebble watch to find your misplaced Android device (or use your phone to find you watch).   - Ringtone: selectable ringtone and adjustable volume.   - Vibrate: vibrate the phone when being paged.   - Strobe Light: strobes the camera flash when being paged (may not work on older devices).   - Page your Pebble watch from you phone (vibration / backlight). - App Bundles: multiple options for Utilities and Social bundles to save app slots. Permission Breakdown - Read / Write External Storage: used to install apps to Pebble watch and log Pebble Rocker errors. - Camera / Flashlight: used by Phone Pager to create strobe light and Camera Control to take pictures. - Record Video / Audio: used by Camera Control to record video (with sound). - Disable Keyguard: used by Phone Pager and Camera Control to turn on screen (for legacy devices). - Vibrate: used by Phone Pager to vibrate phone when being paged. - Network Communication: used by Facebook, Foursquare, Twitter & Events apps. Also used for Analytics (can be disabled). - Location: used by Foursquare & Events to find nearby venues. - Access Wifi State / Change Wifi State: used by Android Settings to manage wifi state. - Bluetooth / Bluetooth Admin: used by Android Settings to manage wifi state.

description: This application is android version of Super PI which is used to test the performance and stability of your android device, by calculating π to a specified number of digits after the decimal point. Features: * Calculate Pi using FFT and AGM, fast and reliable algorithm. * Optimize for most ABI(Application Binary Interface) including armeabi, armeabi-v7a, mips and x86. * Support pre-defined typical digits up to 4 million. * Easily share your results to friends by single click. Here is the result from my Galaxy Nexus, for your reference: ====CPU Information==== Device Model: Galaxy Nexus CPU Type: ARMv7 Processor rev 10 (v7l) CPU Frequency: 1200MHz Number of Processor: 2 ====Pi Computation Result==== 8K digits: 0.083 seconds 16K digits: 0.175 seconds 32K digits: 0.311 seconds 128K digits: 1.671 seconds 512K digits: 9.787 seconds 1M digits: 24.251 seconds 2M digits: 55.583 seconds 4M digits: 130.073 seconds If you have any comment, please send to support@rhmsoft.com , thanks.

description: ★ Yamb (Jamb) is a dice game similar to Yatzy (Generala, Poker Dice, Yacht...), but far more complex! It was created by expanding the game Yatzy. ★ It is a game for 2-5 players but it can also be played individually, where the player tries to score more points than any other player or achieve a personal best. Such kind of games is common when playing with a computer and specialized software. The game allows you to display the best results on the Internet, so the player may indirectly compete with many other players around the world. ★ Yamb is played with 5 or 6 dice and has several versions, with different number of columns and combinations that are being played. The simplest way involves four columns ("Column down", "Free column", "Column up", "Announcement column"), obligatory part (digits from 1 to 6), "Max" row , "Min" row and a four-row combinatorial part ("Straight", "Full House", "Poker", "Yamb"). ★ Remember: Yamb isn’t all about luck; you should also have tactics and a good strategy to win. GAME RULES: 1. Aim of the game. Score as many points as you can and have fun! 2. Rolling dice. Yamb can be played in solitary or by a group. The game consists of 48 rounds. Player takes turn rolling six dice. After each roll, he chooses which dice (if any) to keep, and which to re-roll. The player may re-roll some or all of the dice up to three times on a turn. After ends his turn, player scores his best matching result by combining only five dice. Score table consists of 12 rows and 4 columns in which you enter results of your dice rolls. The winner is player who finishes the game with the most points. 3. Column down. In the first column, the order of scoring is from top to bottom. 4. Free column. In the second column, you can score in any order. 5. Column up. The third column is opposite to the first, the order of scoring is from bottom to top. 6. “N” Column for the announcement. In the fourth column you can score only if you have announced it after you roll all dice at once. You can do it by clicking on the box you would like to announce. 7. Rows “1”, “2”, “3”, “4”, “5” and “6”. First six rows are simple combinations - 1, 2, 3, etc. Score is the sum of all ones, twos, threes, etc., depends what you are collecting. 8. “Sum” row. In this row you score the sum of the first six rows. If the sum is greater than 60, you will be awarded with 30 bonus points. 9. “Max” row. The aim of this row is to score as much as possible points. 10. “Min” row. The aim of this row is to score as less as possible points. 11. Max - Min “Sum” row. The sum in this row is calculated by the formula (Max - Min) x (number of ones in first row). From examples above it is (27 - 8) x 4 = 19 x 4 = 76. 12. “S” – Straight. Combinations 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 or 2, 3, 4, 5, 6. If you get one of these combinations by rolling all dice at once – the result is 66. If you keep some of the dice, and some of them roll again – the result is 56. And if you roll some of the dice three times, the result is 46. 13. “F” – Full House. Combinations of 3 equal dice and other 2 equal dice. For each Full House you will be awarded with 30 bonus points. 14. “P” – Poker. 4 equal dice. For each Poker you will be awarded with 40 bonus points. 15. “Y” – Yamb. This is the most valuable field in the game. You need to collect 5 equal dice. For each Yamb you will be awarded with 50 bonus points. 16. “Sum” big bonuses row. The sum of the previous 4 rows (S + F + P + Y). ★★★ This is a FREE version (Ad - supported), if you like Yamb you can buy the PRO version without ads through a link in our app. ★★★

description: This is the paid version of the Smart Alarm. Please purchase it after confirming whether it works correctly using free version on your device. This is a simple and highly functional alarm clock. It is also very easy to use! You can get the alarm again at the specified time by snooze function even if the alarm is stopped. The alarm can be set to repeat every week on specified days of the week. The wallpaper which is used in the device can be showed as the background for this app by using the transparency setting. 【Other functions】 ■ Corresponds to the holiday in the United States. You can exclude the public holiday from repeated alarm settings ■ You can set the music that is on SD card as the alarm sound. ■ This alarm clock has the mode to increase gradually with an alarm sound and it has vibration that can be set by the strength of the two-stage. They will prevent be surprised to sudden loud alarm sound. ■ It is possible to change the size of the alarm stop button and snooze button. It will prevent the mistake to stop the alarm by mistake. ■ It is possible to set the alarm to stop by solving a math problem or enter the number. You can prevent overslept by an intricate alarm stop operation ■ You can customize Side key, Back key and Menu key as to stop alarm or snooze or adjust the alarm volume. ■ You can switch to enable / disable the alarm sound and vibration in silent mode. ■ You can set whether output the alarm sound from the speaker of the device when the headphones are plugged in. 【Note】 ● If the power of the device is not turned on at the time that alarm is set, the alarm will not work. ● Please register on the exclusion list if you are using any task killer apps or power-saving apps. And do not force stop app on task manager. It may cause the alarm does not work. ● When you set any music on SD card as the alarm sound, it will sound the alarm in the default ringtone if SD card mounts are off at alarm time. ※ We recommend that you set the alarm after confirming the operation of the preview feature when you set the alarm. 【disclaimers】 When you use SMART ALARM ("the Application", hereafter), you need to understand and accept the disclaimers described as below. Although the Application is provided after our sufficient verification, It does not mean that the Application's functions guaranteed to work correctly without problem on all devices. TanyuSoft as a producer of the Application shall not be responsible to correct all the problems occurred on the Application and not undertaking the obligations to it. The company also shall not be responsible to any damage caused by using the Application while a user uses the Application. When you use the Application, please use it with your own responsibility. 【About permissions】 "PREVENT DEVICE FROM SLEEPING" → is used for prevent device from sleeping when alerting. "CONTROL VIBRATOR" → is used for the vibration function. "AUTOMATICALLY START AT BOOT" → is used in order to configure the alarm timer when you boot the device. "READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY" → is used to check whether the device is the incoming call or during a call when set alarm time. The alarm does not work when the device is the incoming call or during a call. "MODIFY/DELETE USB STORAGE CONTENTS MODIFY/DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS" → is used for backup and restore the alarm settings. "MODIFY GLOBAL SYSTEM SETTINGS" → is used to show next alarm time on lock screen.

description: Gyro Poker combines slots and video poker. Try to make the best poker hand possible on each bet line played within two spins. After the first spin choose cards to hold. Scoring takes place after the second spin. If a HAND VOID card appears anywhere in a line on either spin, that hand is dead and cannot score any credits. Risk your winnings each spin by playing mini games such as high/low and red/black to further increase amount paid. Play One Deck mode where cards do not repeat between spins unless held by the player. This is traditional video poker. Play Multiple Deck mode where cards repeat increasing your chances of winning. This is more like a slot machine. GAME PLAY RULES: 1 Credit = Traditional Video Poker >1 Credit = Gyro Poker Slot Machine Play 1 - 4 credits to cover up to 4 lines 1 - 4 Horizontal Lines Costs zero credits to hold cards. Play 5 credits to cover up to 12 lines: 5 Horizontal Lines 5 Vertical Lines 2 Diagonal Lines (corner to corner) Costs 1 credit per each card held. NOTE: This game is FREE but contains some advertisements.

Drive your way through a zombie apocalypse! Give Earn to Die a test drive today, and see why the hit online game series that enjoyed OVER 200 MILLION PLAYS is bigger and better for your mobile and tablet. THE BEST OF THE ACTION, DRIVING AND UPGRADE GENRES You're stranded in a desert surrounded by zombies. With only a run-down car and a small amount of cash at your disposal, your mission soon becomes clear – to drive through hordes of zombies in order to escape... alive! Earn to Die sees you not only driving your way through hordes of zombies, but allows you to earn cash to upgrade, unlock and customise new vehicles. Is your vehicle not strong enough? Why not add a gun, or boosters, or even a spiked frame? Earn to Die Lite lets you play through the first level of the Story Mode for free. Once you've completed your test run don't miss out on the full version of Earn to Die so you can: ● Smash your way through the rest of the STORY MODE, which sees you driving cross-country during a zombie apocalypse ● Get access to all 8 VEHICLES, including a race-car, a truck and even a school bus! ● UPGRADES GALORE! Just unlocking a vehicle isn't enough, customise each vehicle with a range of upgrades ● Zombiesssssssssssss... Plenty more zombies to smash through... Be sure to introduce them to your car's front bumper ● Race for the best time in Championship Mode. ● Survived the zombie apocalypse? Smash through pumpkins in Halloween Mode So think you've got what it takes to survive the zombie apocalypse? Download and try your luck today. Note: Some aspects shown in the screenshots may only be available on the full version of the game.

description: With NICE gomobile, you can buy bus tickets anytime and anywhere. The Official NICE gomobile app is like having a vending machine in your pocket. No need to carry a MetroCard or fumble for change, gomobile will revolutionize your NICE bus experience! With gomobile, you can quickly and easily purchase NICE bus tickets, check schedules, service alerts, route maps and more! Purchasing a ticket is easy: select your ticket type, enter payment information, and you’re ready to go. To pay your fare, all you have to do is tap to use a ticket and then show your phone to the driver. You can also easily store tickets for future use. We are working to make the app even better so let us know what you think by emailing NICEticketing@veoliatransdev.com Features: - Buy your tickets anytime, anywhere - No need to find a MetroCard reseller or vending machine to pay your fare - No need to carry exact change for every trip - Store tickets on your phone for future use - Never lose your ticket – tickets can be easily transferred if your phone is lost or stolen - Check service alerts, schedules, route maps and more

description: "Tear Coupon - Magic Locker Theme" is a Magic Locker Theme. The distinctive design make your phone outstanding. Can use your wallpaper to change the sell item for the coupon. Just simple slide down to tear the coupon for unlock. To run this lock screen theme app, you must install MagicLocker App first.(Follow the installed theme app indication or search 'mobi.lockscreen.magiclocker' in Google Market) ******** If you like our app please rate us five stars. Also your feedback is very important， please feel free to contact us at lockscreen.mobi@gmail.com if you meet any bugs or want any improvement! ******** Q&A: Q: How to find more Magic Locker Themes? A: You can press 'More Themes' button in 'MagicLocker Setting -> Themes Tab'. Or search 'mobi.lockscreen.magiclocker.theme' in Google Market directly. Q: How to install Magic Locker Themes? A: After you install a Magic Locker theme app, you need to run the theme app and press 'Install this theme' button in the theme dialog. Q: How to uninstall Magic Locker Themes? A: You can long press a theme in 'MagicLocker Setting -> Themes Tab' then press 'Uninstall theme'. Or go to 'System Setting -> Applications -> Manage applications' then find the theme App to uninstall as general App. Q: Why the 'Lost Robot' theme can't be uninstalled from MagicLocker? A: 'Lost Robot' is the default theme in Magic Locker and Magic Locker must ensure there is at least one theme exist. Q: Why a theme disappeared from 'MagicLocker Setting -> Themes Tab'? A: First, please ensure your SD card is available, if yes, please try to reinstall the theme app. Tags: locker,lock screen ,lockscreen, theme, themable,keyguard, magic,

Mit der App wird Ihre TV SPIELFILM interaktiv. Zusammen mit dem Heft können Sie mit der App Videos ansehen, an Umfragen teilnehmen oder sich an ausgewählte TV-Sendungen erinnern lassen! Starten Sie die App, wählen Sie im Menü die entsprechende Heftausgabe aus und erfassen Sie die ganze Heftseite (nicht nur das blaue PLAY-Symbol!) mit der Kamera Ihres Smartphones. Sobald die App die Heftseite erkannt hat erscheinen im Display die verschiedenen, klickbaren Funktions-Buttons für Videos, Votings, Wecker u.v.m. Achtung: Die Inhalte können nur geladen werden, wenn eine Internetverbindung besteht. Tipps: - Achten Sie auf einen möglichst einheitlichen Lichteinfall auf die Heftseiten. - Nutzen Sie – wenn verfügbar – eine WLAN-Verbindung für schnellere Ladezeiten. - Variieren Sie ggf. den Bildausschnitt und den Abstand zwischen Heftseite und Smartphone. Along with the book you can view videos with the app, respond to polls or be reminded of selected TV shows! Once the app has recognized the issue page will appear in the display and much more, the various clickable function buttons for video, voting, alarm clock Note: The contents can be loaded only when an Internet connection. Tips: - Pay attention to a single possible incidence of light on the book pages. - Benefit - if available - a Wi-Fi connection for faster loading times. - Vary the picture and if the distance between page booklet and smartphone. Enjoy!, The TV MOVIE editors!

description: Вас ждёт увлекательная головоломка (ребус), в которой по картинке (фотки) вам нужно будет отгадать звезду спорта, название команды или клуба, вид спорта, название снаряда, фамилию тренера и т.д. В общем, всё что касается здорового образа жизни! Вопросы начиная от футбола, хоккея, баскетбола, ралли авто гонками и заканчивая такими экзотическими видами спорта как мотобол и рафт! :-) Игра очень увлекательная и интересная, но хотим сразу предупредить – не рассчитывайте, что вам будет легко! Чтобы разгадать некоторые виды спорта, вам надо будет изрядно «поломать» голову и может быть даже придётся воспользоваться нашими подсказками (удалить ненужные буквы или открыть правильную букву) ! :-) В любом случае, мы гарантируем – время за нашей игрой пролетит незаметно. + 200 увлекательных уровней / вопросов (сотни часов игры) + 100% Русский язык (никаких «корявых» переводов и локализаций) + Вопросы разной сложности (от элементарных до мега крутых) + Удобный, простой интерфейс + Качественные фото + Игра не требует доступ к интернету (играйте в метро, заграницей в роуминге, в самолете) + Поддержка разных размеров экрана (от маленьких смартфонов до огромных планшетов) Игра "Угадай Спорт, Спортсмена" создана для всех поклонников игр типа "Что за слово?", "Угадай фильм по кадру", "4 картинки 1 слово", "4 фотки 1 слово", „Угадай футболиста”, «Угадай футбольный клуб» и т.д. Только вместо 4-х картинок - показывается одна картинка и сверху уточняющий вопрос. Наша игра - это 100% русский вариант знаменитой игры "Guess the Sport", "Guess Premier League Star", «Guess MMA Star» и легендарной - "4 Pics 1 Word" You will find a fascinating puzzle (rebus), in which the picture (pictures) you will need to guess the sports stars, team name or club sport, the name of the shell, the name of the coach, etc. In general, all with regard to a healthy lifestyle! Questions from football, hockey, basketball, rally car racing and ending with such exotic sports as motoball and raft! :-) The game is very fun and interesting, but we want to warn - do not expect that it will be easy! To solve some sports, you will have to pretty "break" the head and may even have to use our tips (remove unwanted characters or open the correct letter)! :-) In any case, we guarantee - time for our game fly by. + 200 fascinating levels / issues (hundreds of hours of play) + 100% Russian language (no "clumsy" translation and localization) + Questions of varying complexity (from elementary to mega steep) + Easy to use, simple interface + High quality photo + The game does not require internet access (play in the subway, while roaming abroad, in the plane) + Support for different screen sizes (from small to large smartphones tablets) The game "Guess Sport Athlete" is created for all the fans of games like "What word?" "Guess the film frame", "4 1 word pictures", "4 photos 1 word," "Guess the footballer", "Guess football club "etc. Only instead of 4 images - a picture is displayed on top and clarifying question. Our game - it is 100% Russian version of the famous game "Guess the Sport", "Guess Premier League Star", «Guess MMA Star» and legendary - "4 Pics 1 Word"
release_text: Важное обновление! Исправлены ошибки Пожалуйста, поставьте нам хорошую оценку!

description: הריון ילווה אותך במהלך ההריון, ויאפשר לך לעקוב מדי שבוע אחר שלבי התפתחות העובר, השינויים החלים אצלך, והבדיקות הנדרשות והמומלצות לאורך שלבי ההריון: אולטרסאונד, שקיפות עורפית, סקירת מערכות, אקו לב עובר, דיקור מי שפיר ועוד. מחשבון הריון ייתן לך את תאריך הלידה המשוער, וכן מידע עדכני בהתאם לשבוע ההריון בו את נמצאת. את המידע תוכלי לקבל גם באמצעות עדכון שבועי ישירות לנייד. הריון כולל ספריית תמונות וסרטוני אולטרסאונד, המציגים את העובר לאורך שבועות ההריון. המידע המוצג בהריון נותן מענה לשאלות המתעוררות בתקופת ההריון, ויסייע לך לעבור את ההריון באופן נינוח וחוויתי. תוכלי לתאם תור לבדיקה, שיירשם ישירות ביומנך, ולקבל הכוונת GPS להגעה למרפאה. הריון הוכן עבורכן על ידי ד"ר ליאת גינדס, שהיא רופאה מומחית בכירה ביחידת האולטרסאונד המיילדותי והגניקולוגי במחלקת הנשים והיולדות בבית החולים שיבא בתל השומר. ד"ר גינדס עוסקת במחקר בתחומי האולטרסאונד הגניקולוגי והמיילדותי והינה מומחית בבדיקות הנדרשות לאישה ההרה במהלך הריונה. ניסיונה של ד"ר גינדס הוא הן אקדמי והן מקצועי ומתבסס על שנות עבודה רבות. Pregnancy will accompany you during pregnancy, and will allow you to track every other week fetus development stages, changes you, and tests required and recommended throughout the stages of pregnancy: ultrasound, nuchal translucency, review of systems, passing echocardiography, amniocentesis and more. Pregnancy Calculator will give you the date of the birth, as well as updated information in accordance with the week in which the pregnancy is. The information can be obtained either through weekly update directly to mobile. Pregnancy library includes ultrasound pictures and videos, featuring the fetus throughout pregnancy weeks. The information displayed pregnant gives answers to questions that arise during pregnancy, and will help you through the pregnancy as comfortable and experienced. You can make an appointment for testing, registering directly in your diary and get GPS directions to reach the clinic. Pregnancy prepared yourselves by Dr. Liat Gindes, which senior specialist physician obstetrical ultrasound unit and Gynecology Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology at Sheba Hospital in Tel Hashomer. Dr. Gindes engaged in research in gynecological and obstetrical ultrasound and is a specialist in the required testing pregnant woman during her pregnancy. Experience of Dr. Gindes is both academic and professional, based on many years of practice.

Therefore, go ahead, and make your kids happy! Welcome to the jigsaw world! Jigsaw puzzles are for many reasons the best free games for kids. Putting the puzzle pieces together represents an excellent hand coordination practice for every toddler. Interesting puzzles for toddlers can also be great for preschool children. Images of teddy bears will make your toddler smile so cordially when it manages to complete the whole image. Putting the pieces together is quite a challenge for preschool children. This remarkably useful yet fun game will help your toddler develop its full mental capacities. The child will learn that the whole is made of pieces. It will probably not be easy for small kids to put together the whole image, so make sure you are around to help. This will make an even closer connection between you and your child and will leave lasting happy childhood memories in your child's mind. Apart from hand coordination and enhanced cognitive functions, your child will learn to recognize colors and shapes better. These skills might seem unimportant, but actually this is exactly what builds base for later learning in school. The more preschool learning games your child is able to play, the better results it will get in school. Free jigsaw puzzles are the easiest and the best way to provide your toddler with a good mental practice. Give your child the most fun games to play with. Help your toddler become a true puzzlemaker. With kids learning games such as this one, your child will grow up to be a smart and happy teenager. Instead of playing with a toy, have your preschool kid learn to count. You can count the pieces together. Make it a child's play so that your little angel associates learning and fun later in life. Make sure that puzzle games become your toddler's favorite fun activity. Good learning games for kids that are fun and educative at the same time are hard to find. These images of cute teddy bears will melt your heart and put a smile to your child's face. Don't waste your time and download Teddy Bear-Kids Jigsaw Puzzles for free! Enable your little angel an educative playtime. Have fun putting together the pieces of free educative games!

Easy Chinese is a perfect tool to start learning chinese (mandarin) quickly and easily. It's even perfect to be used as a travel guide while you go to china. It contains all the basic words and sentences you need to know to be able to communicate with people. It's a really rich application containing hundreds of words organized into several categories : - Restaurant - Numbers - Greetings - Colours - Directions - General - Dates - Hotel - Shopping - Entertainment - Emergency - Troubles - Transportation - Family - Love - Bad Words All the sentences are in english with their chinese translation. All of them are listenable with a high quality recording of a native chinese speaker. You can consult the sentences by list, or even with an easy to use flash card system which is perfect to remember the sentences ! And of course, you are able to search any sentence through the search engine. No internet connection required so you can use it abroad even if you can't access the internet ! And of course, it's completely ad free. Enjoy !

Clover Paint is a feature rich painting app with deep complexity. With Clover Paint, you are bringing a sketchbook with customizable canvas size, highly sophisticated brush and layer system, plus custom hotkeys and shortcuts for productivity. Clover Paint is tailored for touch devices so that you can draw comfortably without worry about touch interfering. Simply disable Touch event in Gallery/Settings → Stylus (devices with digitizer only) to enable pen-only mode for drawing and finger gestures for moving the canvas around. *** Please try Clover Memo LITE (free) before purchasing Clover Paint. Clover Memo LITE comes with stripped down brush and layer system. Most of fundamental features otherwise stay the same. *** We reckon that the initial learning curve is particularly steep for many users. The following TUTORIAL may get you familiar with Clover Paint Quick guide: http://goo.gl/YM7eE1 . We also recommend a free nice morning/day/night to customize the app to your favorite. *** TECHINICAL FEATURES ----- LAYER SYSTEM * Theoretically unlimited number of layers (as device memory serves) * Custom canvas size * .PSD Import and Export * Basic functions includes creating, cloning, merging and deleting layers * Advanced functions includes Layer lock, Transparency (Alpha) lock and Clipping, in addition with 11 Blend modes ----- ADVANCE BRUSH SYSTEM * Custom shape and texture with Perlin noise support * Number of Blend modes with basic parameters for Brush Size, Opacity and Flow * Jitter effect creates scatter effect for brush strokes and colors. Jitter supports Perlin noise and white noise settings. * Blur and Smudge * Tilt support (for Wacom® Cintiq® Hybrid Companion) * Pressure, speed and time effect. Devices with non-digitized pen can simulate pen pressure to some extend by speed or time effect. description: Monster Defense is a continuation of addictive fantasy story about Ashrem Kingdom that were attacked by enemies in Castle Defense game. This time you have to defend your medieval castles against undead monsters. Monster Defense introduces several new ideas like upgrading chosen abilities, making towers more diverse and making enemies more resistant. Like in Robo Defense enemies can walk wherever they want. They can attack from various directions. Similar to RTS games you can train your own soldiers in town halls and use them to attack enemies. Your towers and soldiers gain experience during fight so become stronger and harder to kill like in RPG games. The game gives totally new dark graphics with graves, lava, zombies, dungeons and many more… Player as a defender have many towers divided into different armored levels. Each one can be upgraded in multiple ways. You decide how to use strong and weak sides of your towers. The game series puts new light on the tower defense game types. It makes them more RTS (Real Time Strategy). Enemies can use bows to attack your turrets from a distance. Player gets bonuses like crystals giving them more gold or increasing towers abilities. This is a great tower defence game for spending time in city jams. The game is totally free and is made especially for you! If you have any ideas what can be improved in this game feel free to let us know and we will add it to the game. You can contact us on facebook: http://www.facebook.com/MonsterDefense Or just send us an email to: centralbytes@gmail.com

description: Drilling Speed and Feed Calculator is a tool to determine the spindle speed (RPM) and feed rate (IPM) for a drilling operation, as well as the cut time for a given cut length. Calculations use the desired tool diameter, cutting speed, and cutting feed, which should be chosen based on the specific cutting conditions, including the work piece material and tool material. Calculated Values: • Spindle speed (RPM) • Feed rate (IPM) • Cut time (min) Features: • A very light weighted. • A very User friendly Interface. Easy to understand the inputs. • All the calculations are done at an eye blink time. Very Speedy Calculator. • All the calculations are very simultaneous. If any of the parameter used in the calculation changes, the new result is calculated on the spot. • A Help Menu. Each difficult concepts are well explained in an easy and diagrammatically way. While using our application if you are facing any issue then you can contact us so we can fix that issue as soon as possible. You can also contact us for any new features which you are looking into your app. We create app as per your requirements.Please contact us at inquiry@capacitywebsolutions.com Checkout Our Website :- http://www.capacitywebsolutions.com/

description: We grew up with the BBC Micro and we loved it, so we're bringing it back to the world! See that Android phone in your hand? That's not Intel inside - it's powered by an ARM processor. The 'A' in 'ARM' stood for Acorn, a visionary British company that produced the seminal BBC Micro, and thirty years later - coming full circle - your phone hosts its venerable ancestor today. Have fun reliving classic games from the 1980s, hosted by BBC Micro preservation website stairwaytohell.com - any questions, please email support@littlefluffytoys.mobi Works at the full 50 frames per second on most recent powerful Android phones and tablets. This means anything significantly better than an HTC Desire or Nexus One (except, annoyingly, the brand new Galaxy Nexus, because it has the archaic GPU from 2010's Galaxy S pushing 240% of the pixels), or any Android 3.x or 4.x tablet. If you try to run this thing on something like a Wildfire or a ZTE Blade, please don't whinge to us that it runs like a dog - just go and buy a Galaxy S II already ;) It's an extremely faithful emulation, way moreso than other machines' emulators, but if you think you can make it quicker, get involved - it's open-source - code it! Works with the specialised controls of the Sony Ericsson Xperia Play (but doesn't run at 50 frames per second). This FREE and OPEN SOURCE application - the source code is published on Github at https://github.com/littlefluffytoys/Beebdroid - is based on B-Em for Linux by Tom Walker and licensed under GNU General Public License v2.0 as detailed at http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html - we encourage others to assist us in developing Beebdroid further. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the license for more details. Beebdroid does not ship with any third party programs such as games - these are accessed via third party websites which have hosted such programs for years. Should any licence holders object to third party websites providing such programs, please contact the third party websites in question. We are furthermore also happy on a best-effort basis to block the visibility of specific programs within Beebdroid upon written request from verified product licence holders. We are also able to offer an in-app payment solution for your programs in such circumstances - please contact us for details. The rights to the BBC Micro ROMs are believed by the emulator community to have effectively fallen into the public domain, having lain unclaimed for many years - Acorn itself is of course long bankrupt, and the documentation for the rights is rumoured to have gone down in the World Trade Center on 9/11. If you believe that you have a claim to the ROMs that has never been disclosed to the emulator community, or indeed has never been proven under law, remember that this is a labour of love, a free and open source preservation effort, and so please talk to us in the first instance, cheers!
release_text: Sound now working on Android 5.0 and later. Added x86 support. Removed adverts. And we're working on some enhancements over the next few weeks - if you have any requests, email support@littlefluffytoys.mobi cheers!

This application is aimed at the organizers of clubs, societies and other types of groups. It allows you to track attendance and identify which meetings and gatherings have been poorly attended. You can also create and review meeting agendas. Group Manager is a standalone application: all records are stored on your phone and you do not need to register with any website. Group Manager allows you to: - Create group members from phone contacts or by manually entering names - Link group members with any number of contacts on your device (such as their parents in the case of minors). - Send SMS messages to the group members (or their parents) - Record the attendance of members - Review attendance of members between specified dates - Review session attendance - Plan and review meetings - Backup and restore records - Export your records as CSV files so that they can analyzed in a spreadsheet application such as Excel or LibreOffice Calc If you need to manage multiple groups you may find another one of our apps, 'Group Manager Plus', is more suitable. This is also available on Google Play. Please note that some devices restrict the number of recipients of an SMS message. For this reason we recommend installing a 3rd party SMS app. Examples of free SMS apps that do not have this limitation are Go SMS Pro, Handcent SMS and Pansi SMS. If you have any ideas on how Group Manager can be improved or extended please e-mail us. Bug reports are also welcome.
release_text: - Added option that fixes 'SMS to Group' on Samsung Phones when using default SMS app - Support for multiple contacts per member added - User can display details of each contact - Added ability to specify date range when displaying member attendance - Appropriate error displayed if user attempts to overwrite a folder during db backup or CSV export

ULTRA STREET FIGHTER 4! Frame Assistant Tool (FAT) and Notes Taking ******************* In App Purchases are DONATIONS only! Only an extra theme is not free in this app ******************* USF4 ready! Includes all the changes from AE 2012 --> Ultra, and the 5 new characters also! See any data that's wrong? Let me know on twitter (@D4RK_ONION) or email ( fullmeterapps@gmail.com ). Thanks! How unsafe is Ryu's sweep on block? What moves can you link after Makoto's standing medium punch on counterhit? What moves can you use to make a 3 frame gap on block with Guile?! If you've ever needed to know frame-data fast, then the "Frame Assistant Tool" or "FAT" is the tool for you! Choose from one of 7 modes: * Punish a Move * See What a Move Punishes * Move Linking * Frame Trap - Lister * Frame Trap - Specific * Frame-Data Viewer * Move List Viewer Then, choose a character and input what you need to know. It's as simple as that. FAT will give you back an answer instantaneously. No PDFs; no fancy images. Just information at your fingertips. ********************** ALSO INCLUDED, is the powerful Character Notes Mode, which allows you to keep notes on every single character in every single match-up. That's 1,849 match-ups! This isn't a plain text editor. Every character's matchups are kept entirely separate, the only app on the market that keeps your notes organised. This app is 100% free (not even any ads, I hate ads.). However, if you want to donate using the IAP, you'll get some nice little bonuses, like shoutouts in the credits, or links to your twitter/website put into the app. Plus, all donations earn you a "dark theme" for the app. Swish. Permissions Explained: *Billing – This is used for making donations to the developer. That's all! If you notice any bugs or incorrect data, please leave a comment below or email me at fullmeterapps@gmail.com and I'll get back to you ASAP DISCLAIMER: * FullMeter Apps is not responsible for any salt which arises from the contents or implementation of the contents of this app. * Given that I'm working with frame-data, some things like punishes etc. may not work if you're not in range to use them. This is a limitation of working with frame-data rather than emulation so you'll have to test the results out yourself! * I am in no way affiliated with Capcom and they still own all the rights to USF4.

description: Fetch the Dead Of The Day, from thousands of concerts made available on the Internet Archive by the Grateful Dead and their fans. The Dead Of The Day app provides a simple interface to stream music from the most extensive collection of live recordings ever assembled. At the push of a button, the app selects and streams a song from a concert played on the current date, week, or month from among the band's 30 years of touring. The simple media player interface displays the concert venue, date, and song title, and lets you navigate through the music - pause and restart playback, skip or repeat songs, go to the start or end of a concert. You can set concert search preferences according to your taste - choose crystal-clear soundboard feeds or rowdy audience recordings, select from your favorite years and decades, pick a random song or listen to an entire concert. And save your favorites for repeated enjoyment. Whether you're a die-hard Deadhead or just discovering the Dead, you're sure to enjoy thousands of hours of the best live music ever recorded. Have you had your Dead Of The Day?
release_text: New features in version 1.3: - Reduced gaps between songs when playing in continuous mode - Resizable text in concert info area using standard two-finger pinch/stretch gesture
